name: Duck Shoot (Your Computer)
overview: A duck shooting game by David Rees and published in Your Computer 1984/02. Duck Shoot is a fast arcade-type game for the Commodore 64 with a joystick. The object of the game is to shoot down ducks that are flying overhead. The higher the duck that is shot, the more points you gain, and after 30 seconds your final .score is given. The interesting point of this game is its Speed, over 60 moves per second. This can be increased to over 100 moves per second, when you have mastered the game, simply by lowering the number Poked in line 390.
